description: the contract is up to 8 months
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Connected Care Medical Module

[**Solicitation Number**: WS3674180796]

**Publication Date**: 2022-09-20
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-09T14:00:00 (Amended: Note the correction to closing time)

**Overview**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) invite suppliers to submit proposals for the design, development, testing, and demonstration of a Connected Care Medical Module (C²M²).

**Objective**: The successful supplier will provide services for the design, development, and testing of a Connected Care Medical Module (C²M²), which will be used to support the CSA's health and well-being of astronauts.

**Duration**: The expected contract duration is up to 8 months.

**Bidders' Conference**: A virtual bidders' conference will take place on 2022-09-27 at 1400 HNE (EDT). This conference will provide an opportunity for suppliers to clarify any aspect of the RFP.

**Eligibility**: Suppliers are expected to be Canadian and that the services and goods provided must be from Canadian sources.

**Language**: English/French.

**Proposal Submission**: Proposals must be submitted to PWGSC through the Ariba Discovery platform (RFX) by the close of business on the above-mentioned closing date.

**Additional Information**: Full specifications can be found in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document attached to this announcement. A bidder is also expected to review the Notice of Proposed Procurement published on Buyandsell.gc.ca.

**Contracting Entity and End User Entities**: The contracting entity is PWGSC on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency. The end entity will be the Canadian Space Agency.

Contact Information:
- Jessie Jutras (SPAC/PSPC)
- [Email Address](mailto:jessie.jutras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 

[End of Announcement]
